statements: SELECT * FROM insurers;
SELECT insurer_name, claim_amount FROM insurers WHERE policy_type='Health';
SELECT insurer_name, claim_date FROM insurers WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM insurers WHERE insurer_id=3;
SELECT COUNT(insurer_id) AS total_insurers FROM insurers;
SELECT * FROM insurers WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT insurer_name, claim_amount FROM insurers WHERE policy_type = 'Life';
SELECT insurer_id, claim_amount FROM insurers WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM insurers WHERE insurer_name LIKE '%insurance%';
SELECT insurer_id, insurer_name, policy_type FROM insurers ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claim_data WHERE member_id = 12345;
SELECT claim_date, claim_amount FROM insurance_claim_data WHERE member_id = 54321;
SELECT member_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM insurance_claim_data ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(claim_amount) AS avg_claim_amount FROM insurance_claim_data;
SELECT member_id, claim_date FROM insurance_claim_data JOIN risk_assessment ON insurance_claim_data.member_id = risk_assessment.member_id;
SELECT member_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM insurance_claim_data WHERE member_id = 12345 AND claim_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT member_id, age, risk_score FROM risk_assessment WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY risk_score DESC
SELECT claim_amount, claim_date, member_id FROM insurance_claim_data WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_amount DESC, claim_date ASC
SELECT risk_score, member_id FROM risk_assessment WHERE pre_existing_conditions = TRUE AND risk_score < 3.0 ORDER BY member_id
SELECT claim_date, claim_amount FROM insurance_claim_data WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY claim_date DESC
SELECT * FROM insurer;
SELECT insurer_name, location FROM insurer WHERE policy_type = 'Health';
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM claim_history ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT insurer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_claims FROM insurer JOIN claim_history ON insurer.insurer_id = claim_history.insurer_id GROUP BY insurer_name;
SELECT MAX(risk_score) AS highest_risk_score FROM risk_assessment;
SELECT * FROM insurer ORDER BY insurer_name DESC, insurer_id ASC;
SELECT insurer_name, location FROM insurer WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM claim_history WHERE claim_amount > 1000.00;

SELECT insurer.insurer_name, claim_history.claim_amount, risk_assessment.risk_score FROM insurer INNER JOIN claim_history ON insurer.insurer_id = claim_history.insurer_id INNER JOIN risk_assessment ON claim_history.claim_id = risk_assessment.claim_id;

SELECT insurer.insurer_name, COUNT(claim_id) AS total_claims FROM insurer LEFT JOIN claim_history ON insurer.insurer_id = claim_history.insurer_id GROUP BY insurer.insurer_name HAVING COUNT(claim_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM Member;
SELECT member_id, member_name, gender FROM Member WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, diagnosis FROM Claim WHERE claim_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT provider_name, provider_type, location FROM Provider ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT assessment_id, risk_score, prediction_dt FROM RiskAssessment WHERE risk_score > 3.0 ORDER BY prediction_dt;
SELECT * FROM Member
SELECT member_name, date_of_birth FROM Member WHERE gender='Female'
SELECT provider_name, provider_type, location FROM Provider ORDER BY provider_name DESC
SELECT claim_amount, claim_date, diagnosis FROM Claim WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_date
SELECT assessment_id, risk_score, prediction_dt FROM RiskAssessment WHERE risk_score BETWEEN 3.0 AND 6.0
SELECT * FROM insurers;
SELECT insurer_name, business_type FROM insurers WHERE business_type = 'Health';
SELECT policyholder_name, age, gender FROM policyholders WHERE age > 30;
SELECT insurer_name, address FROM insurers ORDER BY insurer_name ASC;
SELECT policyholder_name, gender, address FROM policyholders WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY policyholder_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurers WHERE business_type = 'Healthcare' ORDER BY insurer_name ASC;
SELECT policyholder_name, age, gender FROM policyholders WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT c.claim_id, c.claim_date, c.claim_amount, a.risk_score FROM claims c JOIN assessments a ON c.claim_id = a.claim_id WHERE c.claim_amount > 5000;

SELECT p.*, a.risk_score, pr.predicted_cost FROM predictions pr JOIN assessments a ON a.assessment_id = pr.assessment_id JOIN claims c ON c.claim_id = a.claim_id JOIN policyholders p ON p.policyholder_id = c.policyholder_id WHERE pr.predicted_cost < c.claim_amount;
SELECT ph.*, c.claim_date, c.claim_amount FROM policyholders ph JOIN claims c ON ph.policyholder_id = c.policyholder_id WHERE ph.address LIKE '%Avenue%' ORDER BY c.claim_amount DESC;
